abstract: Florida prosecutors inform family of Corey Jones, black man who was shot by Palm Beach Gardens Police Officer Nouman K Raja, that he never fired his weapon at officer; Jones's gun was found on ground after shooting; members of Florida Legislature’s Black Caucus have asked governor to start independent investigation.
lead_paragraph: Officer Nouman K. Raja, who shot and killed Corey Jones, got in trouble at another police department for mishandling evidence, including morphine, records show.

headline.main: Man Killed by Officer in Florida Didn’t Fire His Weapon, Prosecutors Tell Family
headline.print_headline: Man Killed by Officer in Florida Did Not Fire His Weapon, Prosecutors Tell Family

snippet: Officer Nouman K. Raja, who shot and killed Corey Jones, got in trouble at another police department for mishandling evidence, including morphine, records show.
